snippet: For a more tender, flavorful, crisp-edged cornbread, brown your butter and bake in a hot skillet. (Article plus video.)
abstract: Melissa Clark A Good Appetite column shares recipe for brown butter skillet cornbread.
lead_paragraph: For a more tender, flavorful, crisp-edged cornbread, brown your butter and bake in a hot skillet. (Article plus video.)

headline.main: Cornbread That Gets the Most Out of Butter
